# harvester_ippool (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "harvester_ippool" "service_ips" {
  name = "service_ips"

  range {
    start   = "192.168.0.1"
    end     = "192.168.0.254"
    subnet  = "192.168.0.1/24"
    gateway = "192.168.0.1"
  }
}
```
